hints.content:
![](${☣ LOCALPATH}/images/04b9ae64d31b927824e4abdadda454aa.png)

We can take apart $\green{10}$ to make $\pink9$ and $\blue1$.  
We can put together $\pink9$ and $\blue1$ to make $\green{10}$.

question.content:
**Fill in the blanks.**  

 | | |
:-: | :-: | :-:
$10-9=$ [[☃ input-number 1]] | because | [[☃ input-number 2]] $+$ $9=10$
